title: Script
content:
Trying to identify the script that says "Wear your for Decatur"

Any help is appreciated. Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [D-Love-banner.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828211716/http:/typophile.com/files/D-Love-banner.png) | 295.64 KB |
author: elias_stein

comments.content: [Lavanderia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828211716/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=lavanderia), donationware font by James T. Edmonson
Aha, thank you. I actually have Lavanderia on my system but was missing that weight, hence why I thought it might be something different. Thanks again!
